subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nand-ranked Rafael Nadal looked susceptible to an upset by Richard Gasquet before rallying to win, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, in Gold Group play at the Masters Cup in Shanghai. Then sixth-ranked David Ferrer came out hot, breaking No. 3 Novak Djokovic’s powerful serve in the first game and never letting up during a 6-4, 6-4 triumph.
